Detailed Description

The PID list structure used for an S75Plus device. This structure is also used by devices that support the Pro feature set. Devices that don't support the Pro feature set will ignore the destination information and will assume all control flags are set to 1 (MPE).

Supports up to 32 PIDs.

Pass a pointer to a populated instance of one of these to setPIDList() if you are programming an S75Plus device.

Pass a pointer to an empty instance of one of these to getPIDList() to have the device fill it in for you.
